C <- A + B;  A @ 0x10, B @ 0x20

lw R1,R0(0x10) = 010101 00001 00000 00000 000000010000 = 0xA8400010  
lw = 010101
R1 = 00001
R0 = 00000
0x10 = 000000010000

lw R2,R0(0x20) = 010101 00010 00000 00000 000000100000 = 0xA8800020
lw = 010101
R1 = 00010
R0 = 00000
0x10 = 000000100000

add R1,R2 = 000001 00001 00010 00000 000000000000 = 0x8440000
add = 000001
R1 = 00001
R2 = 00010

sw R3,R0(0x3) = 010110 00011 00000 00000 000000000011 = 0xB0C40003 
sw = 010110
R3 = 00011
R0 = 00000
0x3 = 000000000011

Program 2 for loop sum

li R1,0 = 000111 00001 00000 00000 000000000000 = 0x38400000
li = 000111
R1 = 00001
0x0 = 000000000000

li R2,0 = 000111 00010 00000 00000 000000000000 = 0x38800000
li = 000111
R2 = 00010
0x0 = 000000000000

li R3,0 = 000111 00011 00000 00000 000000001010 = 0x38C0000A
li = 000111
R3 = 00011
0x0 = 000000001010

add R2,R1 = 000001 00010 00001 00000 000000000000 = 0x28840001
add = 000001
R2 = 00010
R1 = 00001
0x1 = 000000000001

addi R2,1 = 000101 00001 00001 00000 000000000001 = 0x28420001
addi = 000101
R1 = 00001
0x1 = 000000000001

bnq R1,R2,-3 = 100000 00001 00011 00000 111111111101 = 0x100460FFD
bnq = 100000
R1 = 00001
R3 = 00011
-0x3 = 111111111101
